attributes.action: BAN OR CUT SIGNIFICATLY THE AMOUNT OF IMIGRANTS ALLOUD OR ALREADY IN UK BY AT LEAST HALF (50%)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to show the prime minister that we do not want so many imigrants in this country,

there are already too many imigrants here this is NOT racist but a fair petition!!!!!!!!!!

i have lived where i have for 22 years and in the last say 3 to 5 years there has been an uncontrolled amount of imigrants movin in.

Our country is only small already over crowded, i can see before my time ends a civil war occuring!!

im only 22 and i can see this matter is getting out of hand so why cant YOU!!

our country is already far to leanient on this matter.

STOP this war from happening!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
